about_the_game: Slimey is a simple action game. Currently undergoing a multitude of updates. There is no clear picture for what Slimey will become but it is a game worth trying.
detailed_description: Slimey is a simple action game. Currently undergoing a multitude of updates. There is no clear picture for what Slimey will become but it is a game worth trying.
name: Slimey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU

agcom.descriptors: It's a simple games with a little bit of sexual innuendoes that only an adult would understand for example: "*Winks* You're cute."
